catalog_script_client.name: set the operator

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_ab6db0e31b6d5514cc841f4a234bcbf2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Nuovo prodotto">1f6df4a31b6d5514cc841f4a234bcb65</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>set the operator</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    var grAjax = new GlideAjax("prenota_film_o_videogame_utils");
    grAjax.addParam("sysparm_name", "getOperator");
    grAjax.getXML(setOperator);

    function setOperator(response) {
        var result = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
        g_form.setValue("operatore", result);

    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-01 06:55:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ab6db0e31b6d5514cc841f4a234bcbf2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>set the operator</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Blockbuster" source="x_849476_blockbust">a8dc4b841be559d0cc841f4a234bcb7e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Blockbuster">a8dc4b841be559d0cc841f4a234bcb7e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ab6db0e31b6d5514cc841f4a234bcbf2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-01 06:55:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
